H0.text: word that means separation of church and state. Laicism

H1.text: word that means separation of church and state. Secularism

H2.text: word that means separation of church and state. Disestablishmentarianism

H3.text: word that means separation of church and state. separationism

A4.text: The French version of separation of church and state, called laïcité, is a product of French history and philosophy.

A5.text: The philosophy of the separation of the church from the civil state parallels the philosophies of secularism, disestablishmentarianism, religious liberty, and religious pluralism.

A6.text: The term laïcité was first used in the 1946 constitution.

A7.text: France's 1905 law created a complete separation of religion and state, particularly targeting the Catholic Church, though other faiths were also affected in the interest of neutrality.
